external_games.name: Tizi Town: Doll Dress Up Games

name: Tizi Town: Doll Dress Up Games
summary: Play the best dress up games and dress up chibi dolls and sweet girls in beautiful costumes. Become a fashion icon in the avatar world by donning stunning outfits on adorable chibi dolls and magic princesses in our dressing games. You will go aha when you create stories with Tizi Doll world.
